direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the splitting of items into groups with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods involve selecting the best candidate for a group based on certain criteria.
Both methods involve finding the worst or best combination of items, though for different purposes.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a list of items to be initialized before processing.
The method must be invoked to assign remaining items after the initial split.
Both methods verify the sizes of the groups and handle similar exceptions.
